text: Our God's Brother () is a 1997 Polish Italian German biographical drama movie directed by Krzysztof Zanussi and is based on the 1950 play of the same name by Karola Wojty≈Çy. It stars Scott Wilson, Christoph Waltz, Wojciech Pszoniak, Riccardo Cucciolla, Jerry Flynn. == Other websites == * * Category:1997 drama movies Category:1990s biographical movies Category:Polish biographical movies Category:Polish drama movies Category:Italian biographical movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:German biographical movies Category:German drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Krzysztof Zanussi
title: Our God's Brother
